name: Friendship Church of the Genie Bouncelord
name_original: Friendship Church of the Genie Bouncelord
description:
GIVE IT TO THE GENIE!

Work together to collect all the gems and summon your genie bouncelord master! He wants the ball REALLY BAD, so let him have it!

HOW TO PLAY:

Requires 2 XBOX 360 Controllers

Both players must tilt the left analog stick on their controllers in the same direction at the same time in order to move. If you don't co-operate,THE BALL GOES WILD! Press A to jump at any time.

Go fullscreen with spacebar. Cancel fullscreen with spacebar again.

Created for #BGSJAM7 theme "With Our Powers Combined."

  • Sound Effects - Mike Peters
  • Music - Mark Miller, Anthony Swinnich
  • Else - Don Boody
